column1: Kata Robata////Just came from kata and it was deleeeeecious! It was my 3rd time coming and the experiences get better each time. My bf and i shared the duck gyoza
column5: salmon and soft shell crab roll
column6: and kata ramen. My favorites were the Kobe beef skewers
column8: and the two rolls. I usually like my beef lean with no fat
column9: but I'll make an exception for Kata's Kobe beef because it is just that good. It just melts in your mouth. At the end of the night
column10: i had to resist the urge to order another plate. It gets pretty busy at night but the service here is quick and attentive. I can't wait to come back and get some more kobe beef and try something new!
